programme.title: Alan Cummings Paradise Homes S01 E03 Highland Hideaways and Caves NB
programme.desc: On a journey back to his rugged roots of the Scottish Highlands, Alan experiences an extraordinary hidden getaway living in harmony with ancient land, complete with 360 views and golden eagles circling the property. In Sicily, Alan tours an eccentric family home built above a cave, filled with innovative and intricate space-saving details, including a one-of-a-kind bedroom climbing wall!

programme.title: Art & The City S01 E01 - Chicago NB
programme.desc: "David Keeps explores Chicago’s rich artistic legacy, from historic skyscrapers and world class museums to edgy galleries and street-level creativity. Revealing how the city’s architecture, public art, and diverse neighborhoods shape its vibrant cultural identity ."

programme.title: Art & The City S01 E02 - Paris NB
programme.desc: David Keeps explores Paris’s artistic soul, from haute couture and macarons to Impressionist masterpieces, underground studios, and absinthe rituals uncovering timeless creativity in grand museums, hidden galleries, and the poetic pulse of the City of Light.

programme.title: American Canvas S01 E02 - Austin NB
programme.desc: Dave Holmes dives into Austin’s eclectic culture—from contemporary outdoor art and punk rock markets to tailgating, tech-driven creativity, and gospel brunches—celebrating the quirky, soulful spirit that makes the Live Music Capital truly unique.

programme.title: Andiamo! UPTOWN S01 E01 - Jungfrau & Interlaken, Switzerland NB
programme.desc: Donna will experience Canyoning, Jetboating, Snow Sledding, a unique Zip-Line adventure and so much more in one of Switzerland's most idyllic regions.

programme.title: Andiamo! UPTOWN S01 E02 - Zurich, Switzerland NB
programme.desc: Donna visits Europe's undisputed capital of financial wealth where she will enjoy the history, culture, cuisine and high-end shopping of this extremely clean and cosmopolitan city.

programme.title: Cities Reinvented E00 - New York - Tokyo - Singapur
programme.desc: Before long, most of the world’s population will be living in cities. If megacities are to be in a position to tackle the challenges represented by overcrowding, overburdened infrastructure, energy provision and climate change, appropriate structures need to be established. The title shines a light on innovative architectural and urban-planning projects in New York, Tokyo and Singapore that can be considered exemplary responses to some of those challenges.

programme.title: Preview for "Winter Wonder, Swiss Alps" Relaxing Nature Film

A tranquil soundtrack accompanies the awe inspiring scenery at "the top of Europe". Available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv

programme.title: Preview for "Tahoe From Above" Relaxing Nature Film
programme.desc: Soar over the worlds most scenic alpine lake in the 2 hour 45 minute "Tahoe From Above". Breathtaking aerial cinematography of Lake Tahoe is accompanied by an inspiring instrumental soundtrack. This is a 2 minute preview of the full film available at www.NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Preview of Seasons of Lake Tahoe
programme.desc: The is a preview of the 3 hour long "Seasons of Lake Tahoe", available to stream at www.NatureStream.tv. Relax and unwind with the spectacular scenery of Lake Tahoe. This 3 hour ambient Nature Film explores the dramatic beauty of one of the worlds most beautiful locations. Experience brilliant turquoise waters, snowy wonderlands, slow motion waterfalls, sunny beaches, and exhilarating aerial views in this breathtaking film.

programme.title: Preview for "Tahoe From Above" Relaxing Nature Film
programme.desc: Soar over the worlds most scenic alpine lake in the 90 minute "Tahoe From Above". programme.title: The High Sierra
programme.desc: Journey into the highest reaches of the Sierra Nevada Mountains in this stunning video presentation featuring the fine art landscape photography of Elizabeth & Olof Carmel. Amazing scenes from "The Range of Light" are paired with beautiful instrumentals to create a relaxing and inspiring experience. Witness the drama of the seasons from summers magnificent wildflower meadows to the deep snows of winter.

programme.title: Journey Through Joshua Tree Relaxing Nature Film
programme.desc: Explore a wonderland of unique desert life in "Journey Through Joshua Tree." The Mojave desert of California is home to the unique Joshua Tree forests and sandstone rock formations of Joshua Tree National Park. Enjoy a calming acoustic guitar soundtrack along with the stunning beauty of this desert landscape. Runtime 75 minutes.

programme.title: The Pacific Coast
programme.desc: Experience the natural beauty of the Pacific Coast from Washington State to Southern California. See breathtaking video of spectacular sunsets and iconic locations along the Big Sur coast. The photography and cinematography of Olof and Elizabeth Carmel are paired with relaxing music to provide an exquisite "ambient art" experience for TV and mobile devices.

programme.title: Vengeance For A Voiceless Child
programme.desc: 8 year old Jennifer wakes up in the middle of the night in the arms of a police officer. The man wants her to believe that she is safe, but she realizes he doesnt have a badge as he drives off to a remote area. Later that night, her kidnapper leaves her for dead in the middle of a field after brutally attacking her, and from that moment on, Jennifer vows to remember every single detail about him in order to make sure he’s caught. Her injuries leave her unable to talk, yet she still finds a way to catch him… 19 years later.

programme.title: Curtis Martin Running Towards Success
programme.desc: Legendary NFL Player Curtis Martin enjoyed great success playing for the New England Patriots and the New York Jets. After retiring, he was inducted to the Pro Football Hall of Fame…. yet he openly admits that he really didn’t want to play football and that he was forced into it. What dark trauma from his childhood almost kept him from realizing his true dream and the greatest opportunity of his life?

programme.title: David Goggins The Toughest Man On Earth
programme.desc: Athlete, speaker and soldier David Goggins is known as the toughest man on the planet. Everybody thinks he’s Superman but his internal battle was tearing him apart. In this video, he opens up about a secret he hid from the world and why he feels the need to speak his truth. We hope you enjoy this inspirational short documentary.

programme.title: Escaping North Korea The Search for Freedom
programme.desc: Yeonmi Park was deprived of her childhood and forced to grow up far too quickly in horrifying circumstances under the tyrannical regime of KIM JONG-UN. When she was smuggled out of North Korea she hoped to find freedom and a better life, but things only got worse. This is her story.

programme.title: Mandy Harvey Feeling the Music
programme.desc: When Mandy Harvey completely lost her hearing, her dreams of a career in music came crashing down! Although she could not even hear her own voice, her family encouraged her to pursue her passion and NEVER QUIT. Thats when she went on Americas Got Talent and SHOCKED the entire nation, including Simon Cowell himself!

programme.title: Lauren Wasser The Model With Golden Legs
programme.desc: Lauren Wasser was thriving as a young fashion model, but her life quickly took a dramatic turn when she fell victim to Toxic Shock Syndrome. What started as a normal day for Lauren ended with her being found on the bedroom floor just 10 minutes away from losing her life. Luckily, Lauren survived but was tragically forced to lose both her legs. It seemed like her fashion career was over. But instead, the unthinkable happened.

programme.title: Dr. Edith Edgar Dancing with the Devil
programme.desc: Holocaust survivor Edith Eger breaks her silence on her terrifying experience as a teenager at Auschwitz. Learn how she reclaimed her story and found her voice.

programme.title: Cynthia Vigil: Escaping The Toy-Box Killer
programme.desc: March 20th, 1999, Cynthia meets up with her friend, never expecting she is minutes away from being abducted. When she wakes up, a chilling voice speaks to her – its coming from a recording. As her tears dry up, the early memories of her tough childhood revive, and a voice in her heart tells her: escape.

If Jackson wins, he’ll earn enough money to save his son. But if Backstrom wins, Max could die. How far would you go to save your child’s life?

programme.title: A Life Lesson

programme.title: Deferred Comp Roth Strategies Asset Protection and Gold
programme.desc: "Mike and his wife in Tampa are 39 and 36, they ve got nearly a million bucks saved. Are they on track for retirement? Kate in California is 55 and hopes to retire in the next couple of years. How should she manage deferred compensation and retirement withdrawals? That s today on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast number 514 with Joe Anderson, CFP®, and Big Al Clopine, CPA. Plus, Joe and Big Al answer questions from our YouTube viewers on considering IRMAA when making Roth conversions, paying Roth conversion taxes quarterly or in December or in January, protecting a gifted house from a child s ex, and the tax impact of rebuilding on an inherited property. Finally, 8 years ago, Joe and Big Al said you shouldn t have more than 2 of your portfolio in gold and one YouTube viewer said that did not age too well. What do the fellas think today? We ll find out."

programme.title: Rate Your Retirement Plan Pass or Fail
programme.desc: Would you go to a restaurant that has a C rating or even a B rating? How about your retirement plan? Do you know how your financial plan rates, or are just satisfied that you have one? Having a plan is a big step in the right direction, but is it actually going to meet your goals? Joe Anderson, CFP, and Big Al Clopine, CPA are here today to rate retirement plans and show you ways to make the grade!

programme.title: The Overdue Collapse of the 9-5 Job

programme.title: Why A Record Number of CEOs Are Resigning
programme.desc: "Collectively these men controlled companies with TRILLIONS of dollars in annual revenue and now… they are all gone. If you are THAT old and have THAT much money, it’s not unthinkable that you would want to retire or pursue less intense roles more suited to your old age… like political office… But if CEO exits are treated so seriously and secretively, why has there been such a big spike all of a sudden?"

programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

programme.title: Bitcoin Jesus: The Prosecution of Roger Ver
programme.desc: They call him “Bitcoin Jesus,” though he despises the nickname. His real name is Roger Ver. At any moment, Roger could be arrested for alleged tax evasion and mail fraud. But anyone familiar with his case knows the truth: Roger’s only “crime” was being the very first investor and passionate advocate for Bitcoin. For that, he faces 109 years in federal prison. As devastating as this is for Roger, this case is less about him and more about you.

programme.desc: They call him “Bitcoin Jesus,” though he despises the nickname. His real name is Roger Ver. At any moment, Roger could be arrested for alleged tax evasion and mail fraud. programme.title: Beyond the Headlines: Bitcoin on S&P 500?
programme.desc: Michael Saylor’s Bitcoin play might crash the gates of the S&P 500 as early as Friday, Dogecoin moons on a $6M ETF launch, and Argentina’s peso freefall has Bitcoiners saying “told you so.” The U.S. Treasury is tinkering with stablecoin rules, lawmakers want crypto in your 401(k), and Tether swears it’s not bailing on Uruguay. Meanwhile, Ted Cruz drops a bill for an AI sandbox, and Google admits it’s been censoring political content on YouTube.

programme.title: RUSTIN
programme.desc: Rustin is the story of Billy Stagen - former football hero, present small town sheriff and hero to everyone but himself. His comfortable way of life goes for a 180 as his 16 year old daughter that he has never met is brought into his life. Conflict comes to a head as Billy tries to raise his daughter and deal with the school thugs that are causing trouble in town.

programme.title: SEASON OF THE WITCH
programme.desc: Mary Blackwell travels back to her hometown of Maiden Hollow to clear out her recently deceased fathers house. She takes her two children Alice and Sam with her. Whilst there they discover a tiny village, which has been isolated from surrounding towns and in which the locals have developed their own way of life. The villagers are initially hostile towards the new family, but grow to accept them. Local priest Michael Howdy, however, takes an unhealthy interest in Marys daughter Alice. Villagers Harry Price, John Elliot and Tom Hopkins, notice this interest and keep a close watch on Michael. After being involved in a car crash some years back, Michael has suffered head and brain injuries which spark off a series of surreal fantasies confusing Alice with his dead wife Isobel (who died in the car crash.) Whether or not Alice is connected with Isobel or that she merely has a resemblance to her is left deliberately ambiguous. Michaels illness invades his mind and his sanity leading to him finding himself in position he could never have intended. The villagers enact swift and callous retribution only realizing the horror they have committed at the last moment when it is already too late....

programme.title: Interview with VJ Angelin
programme.desc: Welcome to Tele Vikatan, your one-stop destination for everything television! Get ready to immerse yourself in the captivating world of TV shows, exclusive interviews, soap opera reviews, and more. Our dedicated team is here to bring you the latest updates and behind-the-scenes insights from the exciting realm of television. Discover the thrill of your favorite television dramas as we delve into their gripping storylines and unforgettable characters. Join us as we go beyond the screen to explore the lives of your beloved TV stars through exclusive interviews, where they share their experiences, anecdotes, and behind-the-scenes stories. At Tele Vikatan, we are passionate about delivering high-quality content that caters to the diverse tastes and interests of our viewers. Whether youre a fan of heartwarming family dramas, thrilling mysteries, or gripping romance, we have something for everyone. We provide you with informative and entertaining videos that enhance your TV viewing experience. With Tele Vikatan, youll never miss a moment of the television magic.

Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. programme.title: Money In The Bank
programme.desc: Money money money! Dons safe is full of money. And colonel suggests to put the money in bank. But, Charly Marly and Larry want to become rich!!! and they will just not let go of the money. It is pandemonium in the house and the bank. Bang bang bang!

programme.title: The Happy Prince
programme.desc: The south-bound Swallow sits on the Happy Prince statue. However, unlike its name the Prince statue is crying. The Swallow postpones his trip and decides to help the Prince.

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: While dusting the house store room Dunky finds an old chest containing a treasure map. He is all thrilled. Keet and Cat also join in and are equally thrilled to find the treasure.

programme.title: TEA-PORIS
programme.desc: A gang of biker taporis come to hotel Kelifornia one day. They are such menacing baddies that they play all sorts of funny pranks with Sundar. Sundar being the sincere waiter takes it all until he is so sad that Sundar goes behind the hotel all sad and disappointed. Though Basha loves messing with Sundar, he cant take the bikers messing with Sundar. And our super smart Basha decides to give the bikers a heavier dose of their own medicine. What we see then is Basha in full Ranjikant style and adas punishing the rouge bikers in the most hilarious ways. And an excited Sundar doesnt forget to reward Basha generously with his favourite snacks. And in no time the tapori bikers flee for their dear lives.

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Happy Halloween
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Swimming Class
programme.desc: Dunky wants to learn swimming so goes to the lake with a tyre tube with Keet who is helping looking at the swimming manual to tell him how to swim.

programme.title: Hamster in the House.
programme.desc: Friendly and lovable ‘mad scientist’ Granny Peters accidentally transforms her cute little pet hamster.... into a not-so-cute HUGE pet hamster – and things get interesting when it escapes and decides to move into Gummy’s place uninvited.

programme.title: Smighty Jam
programme.desc: Nardy doesnt believe he will ever be a good athlete, but Zap teaches him to trust his instincts and use Smighty Basketball skills to stop the villains from stealing the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: MeetZoonicornPromi
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Breaking Chai
programme.desc: A holy man with quite a fan following claiming to possess magical telepathic powers turns up outside the shop. Chai Raja is more than accommodating- after all its extra business right at the doorstep and Basha is curious as the flexible Baba flaunts some acrobatic twists that Basha finds interesting. Sundar, on the other hand is too lazy and not enthusiastic about the extra crowd. The Baba is pompous and demanding- he bosses Chai Raja about . Chai Raja sees the crowding eager fans and the extra money and accommodates the demands. But Sundar is irritated by the Babas attitude and would love to get rid of him. Basha on the flipside is won over by the Baba who magically pulls out special bananas for Basha- Basha instantly teams up with the Baba. Sundar annoyed further at this partnership clumsily intervenes and instead he ends up exposing the Baba who was actually an imposter all along. Though the show is ruined, Chai Raja still grins as his shop has suddenly gone all popular and people are streaming in to see the dog that dunnit and Sundar for once, though still a server, beams as he dishes out paw-shaped fritters- his way of giving an autograph.

programme.title: Meep Meep Charlies
programme.desc: Boris and Sandy are fighting over the water sprayer and drenching Uncle Charlie with it. This leaves Charlie with no choice but to call on Deedee’s magic. Deedee finds a spell to make friendship dust as the perfect solution. Whoever the dust falls on will be best friends with whoever they see first. Happy for getting the magic powder they all set off to see Boris and Sandy. But on the way the Doobydoos rush at them so suddenly that they fall all over them and the Doobydoos become friends of Charlie and carry him off. Nino tries to explain the situation to Deedee, but she is too busy to listen. Back over at Charlie’s, the Doobydoos are treating him as a king and tries to run away from his new friends. Deedee finds some of the missing magic powder but tries to find Charlie. Deedee tries to bring things back to normal with magic, but Nino is against it. They find a way to get the twins to work together and splash the Doobydoos with water and wash off the friendship dust. The twins are friends again even though Deedee’s magic didn’t work as expected.

programme.title: Mechanical Mayhem
programme.desc: Victor is tired of the Creepy CandyTM causing trouble and messing up his experiments. He creates a robot, The Sweet Tooth Terrorator, to teach the mischievous little candy a lesson once and for all! Watch as the Creepy Candy TM come up with crazy plans to defend themselves against the giant robot! Can they defeat the robot, or will Victor finally be rid of the Creepy Candy TM? Finally, who is going to clean up the mess?

programme.title: Jack and the Beanstalk
programme.desc: A kind boy GoGo finds a bean seed and grows it, which sprouts all the way into the clouds. GoGo climbs the plant and finds the Giants castle above the clouds.

programme.title: BADminton
programme.desc: Marco & Polo are playing badminton in the backyard like a sweet family. Then the shuttle cock falls on Cats head as he is about to catch Keet.

programme.title: Sing For Your Supper
programme.desc: Deedee is excited to prepare for Mayor De Pfeffle’s banquet the next night, so she is all ready for the much needed sleep and yawns away on her cosy bed. But she and all of Abra-Dabra is wide-awake because of Luciano’s late night opera rehearsal. The next day everyone is so sleepy eyed that they request Luciano as politely as ever possible that they could all sleep if Luciano didn’t sing at night. But Luciano is outraged and declares he will never sing ever again. Thinking that the problem is solved they all return to their homes to practice for the upcoming banquet. Deedee tries out a food invisibility spell on an apple, but ended making all the fruits on the table disappear. But the magic didn’t happen only in Deedee’s house, but all over Abra-Dabra in an alarming rate that Mayor De Pfeffle had to ask Deedee to find a way to reverse it. But when she turns back to her usual self and cannot find Nino, she sings out Nino’s name that make a cherry fruit pop up in a tree, and she is amazed to note that more singing brings the food back. So she rounds up all of Abra-Dabra to sing together to bring the food back. They are able to bring back some of the food, but not just enough for the banquet, so Deedee asks Mayor De Pfeffle to request Luciano to help them out. But Luciano is too puffed up in pride and indignation that he outrightly refuses. Mayor De Pfeffle has no other choice but to postpone the banquet. Discouraged and hungry, Deedee sings a little and gets a small morsel to give her hungry friends, but just then her plate is so full of food when Luciano sings out. He even comes to town-hall where he sings his best and all the food comes back. Overjoyed, Mayor De Pfeffle asks if Luciano would grace the banquet with his awesome talent. Luciano agrees to sing promising to all that he will never again disturb them at night.

programme.title: CHAI-CE CREAM
programme.desc: It is a hot summer day and the customers are sweating. Chai Raja and Sundar are trying hard to keep them cool. To make matters worse a group of school students come with their class teacher as a part of their picnic. And the same time an ice-cream seller comes in front of the shop. Delighted, all the customers and the students flock around him to buy ice-cream. Chai Raja and Sundar are instantly out of customers and business. Totally frustrated, Chai Raja appoints Sundar to canvas the customers back to the hotel. Sundar tries to do some stupid performances to lure the kids back. But things take a twist when Basha teams up with the ice-cream seller. Now it is full on competition. And lets see who wins!

programme.title: MeetZoonicornAliel
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Rainy Blues
programme.desc: Relentless rain and a hot cup of black tea, what more could Don ask for. Raindrops at home? As Don and Colonel take different measures to seal the cracks. Cement, tarpaulin sheets and umbrellas! The trio make sure that it isn’t an easy task.

programme.title: Game On
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Christmas
programme.desc: Its Christmas and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house with a Christmas tree, a small stable and stars, while Dunky is making a nice Christmas cake for the day.

programme.title: Tidy Up Time
programme.desc: Deedee almost falls on her bottom, if not for Nino’s timely save, by tripping on a big red ball in her courtyard. It looks like the twins are having a playing spree but are not careful in keeping things back where they belong. Charlie can’t stand the mess any more that he posts Sandy and Boris with the chore of tidying up the entire place before he gets back from his postman duties that day. Charlie furthers the chore by cautioning them that any toys that are not kept back in their rightful places will be given away, to which the twins sadly agree. But more than tidying, the twins set out messing up what Deedee and Nino are patiently helping them with. The twins neither want Uncle Charlie to give away any of their toys nor are they able to clean it up soon enough. It seems only Deedee’s magic can help them, much to the dismay of Nino. Not only do all the toys magically shut themselves in the toy chest, all of them are nowhere to be seen when Sandy peeps in. The spell seems to have been too strong that it made the toys clear away from the home of the twins and fall in different places all over Abra-Dabra, in Tiggy’s cooking pot, inside Mayor De Pfeffle’s shoe, in Mewmew’s garden, in the front yard of the Doobydoos, and everywhere else. They all set out to get the toys back for the twins but the toy zebra and the toy frog are nowhere to be seen. Finally they find them with the Doobydoos who think the toys belong to them. So Boris and Sandy decide to give them other toys in exchange for Dr Frog and Zuzu. Uncle Charlie returns to see the twins happily play with their most favourite toys and appreciates them for making the home sparkling clean.

programme.title: Nardilicious
programme.desc: Its the annual Cake Festival and the Villains have tampered with Nardys famous recipe, causing the Super Sixs heads to swell and get stuck together. Can they figure out how to use their powers together to stop Sneevil from stealing the Smighty Stones?

programme.title: FIRE AWAY!
programme.desc: On a chilly morning, Xia tries to heat things up with his Golden Katana, but keeps accidentally setting fires. He does no better as the Dragon Warrior. When Negu sends a mutant Heat Monster, the Guardians will have to fight fire with fire…or possibly water.

programme.title: Invisible Don
programme.desc: To take revenge on the rats, Don makes a potion for invisibility. He has one hell of a time playing with Charly, Marly Larry and even King Chomp. But there was some potion remaining. Oo la la! Who will drink it???

programme.title: A Cola Fix !!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are into a new business – COLONEL COLA!!! But there are three unwanted partners – of course the rats! With them running loose in the factory, the dogs have a hard time keeping themselves alive, let alone the business stand. Business turns into a busy mess.

programme.title: The Easter Episode
programme.desc: Wheres the Easter Bunny? And what are chocolate bunny eggs? Gummy and Friends are about to find out

programme.title: Mysterious stranger_1
programme.desc: The stranger walks thru the old library, snapping pictures and making notes all the while mumbling incoherently under his breath, when He stops and rings a bell.he Creepy Candy decide to have the Hooligan J. Beans follow Mr. Dark into the bathroom. They hide and watch. as he goes to the sink and removes his glasses and looks in the mirror.

programme.title: Moo-Ing Trouble!
programme.desc: Help! There is a cow in the bathroom this time, and he is on a mad eating spree, happily mooing away soap bubbles too!Don & Colonel try in vain to get rid of the cow but the three mice seem to have a different agenda. To make matters worse, a bull has made its grand entry into the scene too

programme.title: Super Fireworks Show
programme.desc: Nardy celebrates the Light Region Light Show with edible fireworks, while Sneevil makes a volcano erupt with flowing lava, threatening all of the Smighties. Its up to the Super Six to use their powers and save the day.

programme.title: Party
programme.desc: GrandPa has gone out of town for some days and Cat has planned a cool party with the neighbouring cats. All he has to do is to get Dunky out of the house for some hours and continue his party.

programme.title: Honor Code
programme.desc: Speed and the gang discover that the Mach 6s mysterious jump capability is actually related to Time Travel. Meanwhile the Shadowy Org. is remotely using a device to affect Speeds control over the Mach 6s jumps. Speed realizes this device is what controls the cars ability to jump through time and that it could be the missing part of the Mach 6 engine. They discover that when the parts are combined, the Mach 6 will be a fully functional time machine.

programme.title: JOY RIDE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to clean the Lord of the Wind. They can’t resist riding the annual Surf Winds, but Xia and April end up captured by the Wind Beast. Pai rescues them by repulsing the sensitive Wind Beast with his onion and sulfur-geyser stink.

programme.title: OH, RATS!
programme.desc: It’s quiet…TOO quiet, according to Pai, who’s convinced Negu’s about to attack. Pai prepares a trap. But the evil lord of the Chou World is depressed by all his failures. Mei decides to launch an attack himself. He can only get one mutant rat to follow him…who in turn is followed by lots of fellow mutant rats. The Guardians laugh at Mei and his rats, but the rats have a secret weapon: horrible, high-pitched SCREAMS! Pai knits earmuffs for himself, April, and Xia, then lures the rats onto his trap with cheese. In the end, Pai savors the silence.

programme.title: No rain, no gain
programme.desc: The twins meet Imelda, a very anxious lizard. Because she can see a small cloud in the blue sky, Imelda is preparing to face a hurricane. Perhaps you can think positive and consider that a bit of rain is good for someone else.

programme.title: Spooktacular.
programme.desc: The gang is ‘haunted’ by a mystery spook – and sets out to overcome their collective fear and get to the bottom of the scary mystery.

programme.title: LEMONAIDING THE ENEMY
programme.desc: Feeling sorry for Mark, the Ninjas throw him a bone. This almost backfires, however, when he unexpectedly returns accompanied by Durian and a gang of chumplings.

programme.title: BOLT-ADE
programme.desc: Peelville is plagued by a lightning-charged beverage that is the latest weapon in the arsenal of an intergalactic megalomaniac.

programme.title: Egg Carton
programme.desc: Hepi and Briko using their smarts make the best use of an old egg carton

programme.title: Day At The Museum
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want a pleasant day at the museum. But there are three surprise visitors – the trio. And as they enter, the museum runs haywire. The mummies come to life, the swords fly around and Don is running for his life. How will this all end???

programme.title: Charlie’s Castle
programme.desc: It’s Uncle Charlie’s birthday and the twins have surprised him with a nap mask and breakfast, but the twins want to celebrate a little more by throwing a party and inviting all their friends. Although Charlie wishes to have a more peaceful celebration, he gives in to the pleas of Boris and Sandy. After getting a hint from Charlie on how much he loves chess, boris and sandy plan the birthday party around a ‘knights and castles’ theme. The twins get Deedee to bring balloons, a castle cake with turrets from Tiggy and a jousting dance from Mewmew. Boris and Sandy set out to decorate Uncle Charlie’s house, just in time for their friends coming in with all the goodies for the party. They even invent a balloon jousting game between Deedee and Mewmew that makes Mewmew crash into Tiggy’s cake and thereby wreck all the arrangements much to the dismay of the twins. This calls for Deedee’s magic where all the party ingredients are put into a large purple cauldron and it makes a gigantic bouncing castle in the chequerboard garden. And the snoring sounds lead them to find Uncle Charlie napping right inside it. They bounce around Uncle Charlie as much as they can and then wind down for a long snooze. Uncle Charlie awakes to happily find that the twins have organised his most best birthday slumber party ever.

programme.title: Runaway Custard
programme.desc: Tiggy is busy making custard and Deedee and Nino are helping out. But Mayor De Pfeffle cannot seem to understand what happened to his purple custard freshly sent over by Nino. So Mewmew offers to help while taking eggs over to Tiggy’s. But the carton turns out to only have one egg, and Tiggy needs to make eight more jars of purple custard. The answer seems to lie in Deedee’s magic spell that makes one purple custard jar never run out of purple custard for the entire day. And it works like a charm, non-stop purple custard. The Mayor gets a half eaten jar of purple custard and keeps it safe for after, only to have it finished by the Doobydoos. As the Mayor turns up at Tiggy’s once more for more purple custard, he rushes off with the jar that the spell has been cast on. A happy Mayor gets Mewmew to stay guard of the jar while he is out, and Mewmew catches the Doobydoos red handed trying to eat the custard. But the jar tips over in the confusion and unknown to Mewmew the loyal custard guard, the bottle keeps on flowing till it reaches the ground floor. Deedee is called in urgency and only Nino can fly up the building and put the jar right up again. Having done that they call all the townsfolk to come to town hall to eat up as much purple custard as they can. All join in and have a hearty treat, so much so that they cannot have a bite more. Finally Mayor De Pfeffle arrives and is happy to share his purple custard with everyone, but much to his surprise no one wants any. Wonder why?

programme.title: A Rodent Fix
programme.desc: Don has a new and yummy kitchen garden. And a new thief too! For the first time, don and the rats join hands to catch the unwanted intruder. And it is indeed a veggie mess all around.

programme.title: 51 Follow The Dots
programme.desc: When Pancake can’t resist opening a box of polka dots, the dots escape and cover the Zooniverse. Understanding that there are reasons for rules.

programme.title: Magic Shoes
programme.desc: One day a frustrated Don get a wonderful gift – a pair of magic shoes. He is all too excited to try the new weapons. But the rats make him realize that the gift is in fact a curse. Don is not ready to give up, and at last he turns out to be street smart and succeeds in throwing his arch rivals out of his house – for the first time. But how???

programme.title: The Grand Unveiling
programme.desc: Nino is busy with his artistic pebble sculptures, just when Charlie comes by to hand over a leaflet announcing the unveiling of Abra-Dabra’s new statue made by Mewmew for Mayor De Pfeffle. Sadly they find out Mewmew is totally undecided as to what he has to create in the first place and time is ticking by. Deedee is all too excited to take a peek to see what Mewmew has finally decided to make but it stopped by Nino. Finally Mewmew asks Deedee to enter the enclosed work-space, but not to see the sculpture which is fully covered, but to help move it to the town square. The sculpture is heavy and tiring that Deedee has a tough time getting it there. Mayor De Pfeffle announces the exhibit to be revealed in a couple of minutes and Mewmew rushes under the covering to add a few finishing touches. Mewmew’s symbolises the theme ‘happiness’ by creating a basket of carrots and proudly brushes it to shine more. But as he is there he overhears his friends whispering about things that make them happy like the magic wand for Deedee, a hammock for Charlie and so on. As none of them see carrots as a sign of happiness, Mewmew is in a hurry to make something that will mean happiness to everybody. Having made it Mewmew requests Deedee to magically get the sculpture to town square in a jiffy. Deedee conjures a swapping spell but it makes both the sculptures disappear. So Deedee and friends decide to pose under the sheet in a manner that resembles the happiness sculpture the closest. Mayor De Pfeffle is getting impatient that he removes the covering to reveal all the friends hugging each other trying to console a sad Mewmew. Mayor De Pfeffle is excited to see a living statue that epitomises happiness in a ‘hug’. The townsfolk take turns to use the statue space to express happiness in their own way, life-size.

programme.title: A sticky situation
programme.desc: Ragoo brings in a sticky wrapper and the twins arrive in a sandy desert. They travel to the pond world and to the winter world before they can put it in a bin.

programme.title: More Ways Than One
programme.desc: When Pancake cuts Maple’s toast differently than Mama does, it sends Maple into a tailspin. Then in the Zooniverse an art competition shows her that different can be good. There can be more than one way to do things, and each can be right.

programme.title: I'm fine!
programme.desc: The twins encounter in the woods an owl who can’t see very well, but won’t admit it. Until the twins give him a strange pair of glasses.

programme.title: FRUITFUL MULTIPLICATION
programme.desc: Four green Fruit Ninjas find their first real-life enemy in the form of an ancient ninja with a score to settle.

programme.title: GET THAT GLOVE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Glove of the North in the Magic Fort. Amkko and Koto attack the fort with a Rock-Eating Mutant. The Guardians manage (eventually) to transform into the Dragon, Panther, and Rodent Warriors to drive them off.

programme.title: Shrunken Jam
programme.desc: Don is baking a cake.In an apron.Puts the batter in a container the oven.Turns on the KNOB.And then... when he opens the oven door, the cake is missing. He cranes his neck and sees that there is a hole on the back of the oven! That is it, Charly Marly and Lary will pay for this!

programme.title: The Big Freeze
programme.desc: Charlie is found napping on the job. Deedee and Nino encourage him as being the best postman ever and that anyone would doze off in the sweltering heat. Charlie assures Tiggy that he will take special care of Tiggy’s parcel and off he goes near fainting in the sweaty heat. Charlie even turns down the twins offer to help. In the heat, Charlie makes a wrong turn and reaches town-hall instead of Tiggy’s home, but still presses on to accomplish his mission. En route the special package starts to leak unawares of Charlie who is too tired and stops for a “quick” nap after nearly bumping into the Doobydoos. Deedee and Nino are searching for Charlie and find him at long last. Dejected, Charlie calls himself the worst postman in the world having melted all of Tiggy’s vanilla ice-cream. Charlie wishes Deedee to use her magic, much to the horror of Nino who hides off. Deedee’s magic refreezes not only the ice-cream, but Charlie as well! Rounding up Deedee’s friends they all take turns in delivering the letters and special parcel to keep Charlie’s goodwill intact. Mewmew is too fast that the letters fly our of the bag and the Doobydoos are too short to reach the mail boxes and the twins have a tough time reading the addresses. Finally all the tired and thoroughly perspired friends acknowledge how great Charlie is as a postman. As Charlie is now free to move, they are all surprised by Tiggy’s special delivery of ice-creams he specially made for him favourite postman. Charlie gets a well deserved nap right in front of his giggling friends.

programme.title: You’ve Got Fe-Mail
programme.desc: Fred has written Nora dozens of “love emails” but never sent them—until Sir Percival accidentally hit the “Send” button. To prevent complete embarrassment, Fred hatches a caper to keep Nora away from her computer long enough for Brains to hack into it.

programme.title: Cryyyy-stal
programme.desc: Its valentine day and Dunky has got a small crystal cupid as a gift for his girlfriend. He has care fully kept it on the table…

programme.title: Eggface Revenge
programme.desc: Brains brilliance at mathematics helps her to win a prize, but also the jealousy of Egghead, a brainy space villain.

programme.title: School For Princesses – Snow White Case 2
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of SNOW WHITE, to the home of the seven DWARVES, having been called out by one of these, GRUMPY. When the DWARVES returned from work, they found that SNOW WHITE was not there and there was an opened letter lying on the table. The letter invites SNOW WHITE to enrol at a prestigious school for princesses. SANDRA soon discovers that the letter is the work of the STEPMOTHER and she and FO go to the boarding school, where all the PRINCESSES in the land of fairytales are now living. The STEPMOTHER, who is the headmistress of the school, is jealous of their beauty and has terrible plans for all of them. With their usual ingenuity and a great deal of humour, however, SANDRA and FO will prevent her from putting them into action.

programme.title: Snoring
programme.desc: Granny Peters’ loud snoring winds up keeping Gummy, Harry and Kala awake – and trying whatever schemes they can think of to somehow stop it!

programme.title: Baghdad in Bloom
programme.desc: Aladdin buys magic seeds from the market with the food money believing the plant will bring him riches. However when it doesnt grow he and Jamillah enlist Genie to help, he does his thing and suddenly the plant grows! Everyone in town hears about the plant and comes to see it in Aladdins garden - hoping that they too will get blessed with riches. Even the Sultan comes to see its beauty. The crowd waits with bated breath but when it opens - it stinks like smelly cheese. The crowd disperse but the Sultan is transfixed by the rare scent. He sees the value and beauty in it where others dont and gives Aladdin gold in exchange for the plant.

programme.title: Bored
programme.desc: Kala is bored, and Gummy and Harry’s attempts to snap her out of it wind up having unexpected results.

programme.title: King Pancake
programme.desc: PANCAKE wishes he could be king so that he alone could tell everyone else what to do – only to learn that being in charge isn’t as easy as it looks. Both leaders and helpers are needed to finish any job. Giving orders and taking orders are both important to get a job done.

programme.title: King Of Mortadela - Pinocchio Case 2
programme.desc: SANDRA, fairytale detective, and her assistant, FO, travel into the tale of PINOCCHIO. He, who is now a real, flesh-and-blood boy, has inexplicably grown donkeys ears. At the same time, his father, GEPPETTO, has received an anonymous letter demanding a million liras, otherwise his son will be completely transformed into a donkey. SANDRA and FO investigate and discover that HONEST JOHN and his sidekick GIDEON, two villains from the classic tale, have stolen the BLUE FAIRYs magic wand and is turning the other characters in the story into donkeys.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Gummy, Harry and Kala head off to a scary Halloween costume party – but the winner of the ‘Best Costume’ prize.... isn’t wearing a costume, and is actually a real monster!

programme.title: Eye Strain
programme.desc: The rat trio takes their plan one step ahead by fixing contact lens in Don’s eyes while he is asleep, thereby blurring his vision. Now the rats just partyyyyy and Don can’t see a thing. But when Colonel finds out the plan, the naughty rats are definitely in for a surprise.

programme.title: Ski Trip Fun!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are on a vacation, skiing in Shimla. You think the trio would leave them alone?? Hell no!! Romance blossoms in the snow and the rats make sure that Don and Colonel turn against each other. And they have a great time watching them fight.

programme.title: Science Unfair
programme.desc: Fred is not prepared to enter the school science fair, but at the last minute, he transforms Friday into a glove that dispenses soda from the fingers. He wins! Soon he learns though that the fair was an effort to find someone with small enough hands to blast into space and rescue the stranded Astronaut, and Brains’ hero, Caribou Caruthers.

programme.title: Love Me Not
programme.desc: Don is sitting in the bathtub, smiling. He slips down further and gets comfy as he lies in the tub.He turns over and pulls the cushion around his neck closer. Only, it’s not a cushion. It’s an OCTOPUS!And its in love with Colonel!

programme.title: The New Otter In Town
programme.desc: After thinking that his mother doesnt know what its like to be a kid, in the Zooniverse, Pancake becomes friends with a fun otter kid - who turns out to be his mom!. Judging people/People are often more than what they seem

programme.title: The Palace Garden
programme.desc: Jamillah lands inside a beautiful garden, she encourages Aladdin to come and join her but he warns her to get out, they are the Palace Gardens and shell be locked away if shes found in them! But Jamillah has no way out so Aladdin decides to try and rescue her. He rushes home to Genie but Genie doesnt hear in time so he tries to find a ladder on his own to hop over the fence and save Jamillah. Genie catches up with him just as he gets to the palace walls and realizes that the ladder isnt big enough, so he makes it longer. They climb into the palace only to find Jamillah happy and smiling playing games with the Princess. Soon they are all playing and having fun

programme.title: JOY RIDE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to clean the Lord of the Wind. They can’t resist riding the annual Surf Winds, but Xia and April end up captured by the Wind Beast. Pai rescues them by repulsing the sensitive Wind Beast with his onion and sulfur-geyser stink.

programme.title: Road Trip Snag
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is on a journey in their house on wheels. But hey! With the rats around, will they ever have a peaceful anything??? It is indeed a fun for the trio, but not for poor Don and Colonel. The house on wheels turns into a madhouse on wheels!

programme.title: Shhh~ It`s a Secret
programme.desc: The gang is exploring the flowers, but Duda wants to explore something more exciting. He learns about Wibbly-Wobbly Cliff and becomes animated with interest. Unfortunately, Dada tells him not to go there alone because its dangerous. Despite Dadas warnings, Duda persuades Caber to go to the cliff with him. They discover a treasure in a cave but are afraid to upset Dada and promise to keep their find a secret from each other. Duda has a hard time keeping his secret and accidentally lets it slip to Piggy, Puggy and Bubble. Soon, everyone puts the pieces together and goes to find Duda and Caber. Meanwhile, Duda and Caber are in the treasure cave playing with their treasure. However, instead of having fun they seem a little sad...

programme.title: Two Tickets.
programme.desc: When Gummy wins two tickets to a big dance show, each of his best pals vie to be the one he gives the coveted second ticket to.

programme.title: Diver Bros
programme.desc: Don and colonel are in a boat getting ready for sea diving. And anything can happen in water. Or else larry charly and marly will make sure that anything would happen. Every single creature in the turns against them and the dogs run for their life.

programme.title: I Need A Cleaning Fairy
programme.desc: Scot invents a new machine called the Cleaning Fairy. Its an amazing invention that cleans everything by itself, but it does have a slight crease. It doesnt know when to stop and is so powerful that it can fly objects as large as a camping car. Meanwhile, Dada entrusts Pinkar to Caber when he goes out to look for deer. But Duda appears with a ball and Pinkar becomes a mess of mud. Duda discovers Scots Cleaning Fairy and puts him to work. Everything seems to be going well until the invention takes off and takes Pinkar to heaven. Duda, Caber and Scot chase after him, and to their horror they notice that the Cleaning Fairy is slowly losing her power, meaning that Pinkar could end up crashing to the ground. Just then, Dada shows up and doesnt look happy...

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: There's Good Boos Tonight 1948
programme.desc: Casper makes friends with a fox cub. But the new friendship is threatened when a fox hunter and his two hounds come on the scene.

programme.title: Betty Boop- The Scared Crows 1939
programme.desc: Betty Boop and Pudgy, doing the spring planting, are plagued by crows.

programme.title: Felix Doubles for Darwin- 1924
programme.desc: A famished Felix reads an advertisement telling of a large reward for anyone that can give proof for the theory of evolution. He hurries to South Africa via Transatlantic Cable and interacts with the local animals. He angers a troop of monkeys by telling them why he's there (they're offended he would suggest they could be related to humans) and they chase him back through the cable to America

programme.title: Floor Flusher 1954
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto stop by to see Olive and fix her leaky faucet. Popeye does it better, and Bluto gets jealous, so he starts rerouting Olive's plumbing and causing all sorts of leaks. Popeye needs some help from the goldfish to get to his spinach

programme.title: The Gumby Show: Mysterious Fires 1957
programme.desc: A knight mistakes Gumby for a magician and asks for his help in fighting a set of mysterious fires around the kingdom.

programme.title: Often an Orphan 1949
programme.desc: Charlie Dog tries everything to get Porky to take him in and he finally does. After a couple pranks the dog pound ends up picking up Porky and not the dog.

programme.title: A Spanish Twist 1932
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry (the human versions, not the cat and mouse) are on a raft in the ocean. After being attacked by an octopus and losing their raft, they wash up on the shores of Spain. After harassing the waitresses at a local sidewalk café, they insult the owner and wind up in a bull ring as punishment. In the midst of fighting dozens of bulls, they receive a telegram that Prohibition has been repealed back in the U.S. They immediately leave Spain headed back to the U.S. for a drink

programme.title: Cookin' with Gags 1955
programme.desc: The boys are taking Olive on a picnic. It's April 1, and Bluto plays a series of "jokes" on Popeye, though of course they go beyond the bounds of acceptability, particularly once they get to the picnic grounds; Bluto puts gasoline on the fire he asks Popeye to light and swaps a beehive for the lemonade. Bluto then launches a cruel joke against Olive and frames Popeye. The capper: he replaces Popeye's spinach with a joke can, and runs off with Olive for some canoeing. But Popeye gets the last laugh with an inflatable sea monster.

programme.title: Popeye Meets Sinbad the Sailor 1936
programme.desc: The legendary sailors Popeye and Sindbad do battle to see which one is the greatest.

programme.title: Gold Rush Daze 1939
programme.desc: A man stops for gas on his way to dig for gold. The man at the station tells him what it was like back in 1849 in San Francisco, which we see. A sucker is hauled off the street and sat down at a card game; he dashes off as soon as someone shouts "they found gold in the hills" but others stake claims before he can. He ends up chopping off a cliff, falling down, and landing in the hospital. The doctor gives him news of another gold strike and he rushes out to begin panning. After some more mining gags and a song, we see a montage of more failed gold strikes. Back to the present day, where the storyteller claims to have sworn off gold, until a rider passes through with news of another strike, when he trades the station for the car and sets out after the gold.

programme.title: Little Lambkin- 1940
programme.desc: A precocious toddler, wanting to return to his watermelon patch and a pair of animal friends in the country, tampers with the electronic gadgets in his new city home and creates chaos.

programme.title: The Friendly Ghost 1945
programme.desc: Depressed by the antics of the other ghosts, Casper leaves home to make friends. After unintentionally scaring several potential pals, Casper befriends two young children. They take him home, where Casper frightens their mother. Casper is again upset because he believes that he will always scare away his potential buddies. However, Casper scares away a banker who is coming to foreclose on the woman's house, and this wins her heart for Casper.

programme.title: Felix the Ghost Breaker-1923
programme.desc: Felix is trying to get some sleep in a graveyard, but keeps getting bothered by a ghost. He follows the ghost to the house of an old farmer, and the ghost proceeds to terrorize the old man, and when the farmer calls for help from the police, the ghost terrorizes them, too. Felix, however, suspects something fishy is going on, and with the help of the farmer's donkey, gets to the bottom of things.

programme.title: Little Boy Blue 1936
programme.desc: The Big Bad Wolf stalks Little Bo Peep and steals one of her sheep. She enlists Little Boy Blue and a dancing scarecrow to assist her and her mischievous black sheep in rescuing it. Singing, dancing, hilarity and impalement ensue.

programme.desc: The Song of the Birds-1935

programme.desc: Superman cartoons 1

programme.title: Lights Fantastic 1942
programme.desc: A tour of the bright lights of New York City, where the various advertising signs come to life.

programme.title: The Return of Mr. Hook -1945
programme.desc: Seaman Hook has big plans for after the war, mostly involving rushing home and marrying his sweetie. So do his fellow seaman, but theirs involve buying bond

programme.title: Goo Goo Goliath 1954
programme.desc: An inebriated stork must deliver a baby to a giant at the top of a beanstalk, but doesn't feel like flying that high and instead delivers the baby to a normal-sized couple, who try to raise the giant tot as their own.

programme.title: Pots and Pans -1932
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry own a restaurant, and have a hard time keeping up with the customers

programme.title: The Conceited General
programme.desc: Set in ancient China. After a great victory, the general becomes complacent and out of practice. When the enemy returns, he acts like a punk.

programme.title: The Star of Bethlehem956
programme.desc: A nativity story animated with music performed by the Glyndeboume Festival Chorus.

programme.title: Molly Moo-Cow and The Butterflies -1935

programme.title: Road to Bali 1952
programme.desc: Two unemployed show-biz pals accept treasure-diving work in Bali for a local princess and they find treasure, love and trouble

programme.title: Boys of the City 1940
programme.desc: Street kids get sent to the country, where they get mixed up in murder and a haunted house.

programme.title: Neighbors -1920
programme.desc: A young couple who live next to each other in tenement apartments do everything they can to be together despite of their feuding families.

programme.title: Steamboat Bill Jr 1928
programme.desc: The effete son of a cantankerous riverboat captain comes to join his father's crew

programme.title: Boys Will Be Joys-1925
programme.desc: Adults have the Pike and Coney Island amusement parks, so the rascals put up their own rides in a large vacant lot. Mickey's got big plans for expansion when surveyors show up to begin work on a factory. The gang travels by donkey cart to the office of Henry Mills, President of Pan American Export Company, to protest. Henry, in his 60s, is still a boy at heart: he has his chauffeur stop the car so he can join a sandlot game. He bails on a meeting with his board of directors, going with the kids to the factory site where he stops the workers and helps our gang add more rides. The directors follow him, and they get put to work. Will they ever have their meeting?

programme.title: The latest sports that you may have missed!
You are watching the latest sports news from around the world!
Game previews, highlights and interviews from your favorite sport!
See what happened in the world of sports while you were sleeping!
Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: A special agent from Chicago is sent out west to bring in the notorious Reno brothers

programme.title: Spook Town 1944
programme.desc: Dty Gulch Trading Post owner Kurt Fabian advances money on mortgages to the local settlers to finance an irrigation program. Three Texas Rangers, Tex Wyatt, Jim Steele and Panhandle Perkins transport the money in a strong box which they place in the Wells Fargo safe as agent Sam Benson assures them that he is the only one who knows the safe combination. Fabian conspires with Bill Gunner, Breed Crocker and Trigger Booth to steal the money and they fail, but Fabian gets it on his own. Benson is arrested, and a committee of citizens, led by Oscar Perrin accuse Captain Wyatt and the Rangers of carelessness and request the resignation of the Captain if the money is not recovered. Fabian owns the abandoned ghost town of "Mystic", and Gunner, Crocker and Booth take him there to force him to tell where he has hidden the money, They shoot at his feet to intimidate him and he dies from fright and shock. Tex, Jim and Panhandle are also searching the town and they find Fabian's body. Benson tells Lucy Warren that the money may be hidden in the old Wells Fargo office in Mystic and they go there and find the strongbox. Enter Gunner, Crocker and Booth. Enter the Rangers. Gunfight

programme.title: Outlaws' Paradise
programme.desc: Gang leader Trigger Mallory is about to be released from prison. When Bill Carson notices the resemblance, he gets the Warden to hold Mallory and he assumes his identity. He fools both the gang and Trigger's girlfriend Jessie as he sets them up to be captured. But Trigger escapes from prison and returns to expose the hoax and Bill is made a prisoner.

programme.title: A String of Blue Beads 1953
programme.desc: In A String of Blue Beads, a touching holiday drama unfolds when a kindly shopkeeper shares the story of a simple Christmas gift that changed a life. As memories of love, sacrifice, and compassion are revealed, the tale reminds us that the season’s true treasures are not found in wealth, but in the bonds of the heart. Gentle, heartfelt, and timeless, this short film delivers a moving message about giving and the enduring power of kindness.

programme.title: Santa Claus 1959
programme.desc: In Santa Claus, the holiday takes a surreal and magical turn in this colorful fantasy from Mexico. As Christmas Eve approaches, Santa battles the schemes of a mischievous demon sent by the Devil to ruin the season for children everywhere. With the help of Merlin the wizard, a loyal band of helpers, and his magical workshop in the sky, Santa must outwit evil and deliver joy to the world. Whimsical, strange, and utterly unique, this cult holiday classic blends wonder, morality, and a touch of the bizarre into a Christmas tale like no other.

programme.title: A Christmas Without Snow 1980
programme.desc: In A Christmas Without Snow, Michael Learned stars as a recently divorced woman who moves to San Francisco to rebuild her life. Joining the choir of a struggling church, she finds friendship, strength, and a new sense of purpose under the guidance of the stern but inspiring choirmaster (John Houseman). As the group prepares for a performance of Handel’s Messiah, their shared struggles and triumphs bring them closer together, revealing the true meaning of hope and community during the holiday season. Heartfelt and uplifting, this made-for-TV classic shines with warmth and faith.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: In this episode of Unrolled, we visit Bennington Tobacconist with owner Jack Bennington. Join Jack as he takes us through his shop, sharing the history of the business, the unique cigar selections, and what makes Bennington Tobacconist a favorite destination for cigar enthusiasts.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Join host Sean Mobley as he sits down with Maurice Mears, the founder of JM Patriarch Cigars. In this episode, Maurice shares the story and inspiration behind his line of cigars, delving into the blends, tobacco selections, and the philosophy that drives the JM Patriarch brand. Get an inside look at the passion and dedication that goes into crafting these distinguished smokes.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: This week on Behind the Blend, host Sean sits down with Ryan Bathurst of Oliva Cigars. Dive deep into the story of one of the most respected names in the industry as Ryan shares insights into Oliva's rich heritage, the craftsmanship behind their acclaimed blends, and what goes into maintaining their consistent quality and innovation. Get ready for an illuminating conversation that pulls back the curtain on the world of Oliva.

programme.title: Unrolled

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow

programme.title: Ed Young Ministries
programme.desc: The Wolf of Wokeism, a neo-Paganistic, neo-Marxist system, is vying for our families across this great nation. Every day, we must fight for the health and safety of our kids. But how do we slay this beast that, at times, seems so innocent while it devours the country's moral fabric? In this talk, Pastors Ed and Lisa Young prepare us for battle, giving us practical handles on building our kids' lives on a biblical, Christ-centered worldview. We’ll discover that when we confront the Wolf of Wokeism with God’s truth, it wilts before our eyes. From victory, we praise our loving Good Shepherd, who will lead us to the greatness of God’s will.

programme.title: Guest Alphonso David
programme.desc: Alphonso David, President of the Global Black Economic Forum, gives us the warning signs and exposes the attacks on DEI. Will boycotts really work?

programme.title: Guest Shaun T
programme.desc: Shaun T is an amazing fitness trainer — the man behind Insanity — and he’s had a fascinating life. He goes deep into how he was sexually abused throughout his youth and how he’s become an inspiration to others and what you really should be doing to get the best workout you can.

programme.title: August 19, 2025
programme.desc: The Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton delivers a video message for August 19, 2025, encouraging you to act with intent and purpose. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities. reACT accordingly!

programme.title: Filmmaker Nailah Jefferson speaks about her digital shorts series.
programme.desc: Tanya Hart speaks with actors, recording artists and creatives in the entertainment industry.

programme.title: Guest Commissioner Michael Cox
programme.desc: As the International Association of Chiefs of Police hit Boston this week we are resharing our conversation with Commissioner Michael Cox of the city of Boston where he discusses his 30-year career with the Boston Police Department and the challenges he faced as a person of color in law enforcement. He highlights the importance of representation and leadership in creating positive change within police departments. The conversation also touches on the Charles Stewart case in 1989 and its impact on the department's practices towards communities of color. Commissioner Cox emphasizes the need for accountability, cultural change, and addressing systemic issues within law enforcement. In this conversation, Commissioner Michael Cox discusses the importance of diversity and representation in law enforcement. He emphasizes the need for leaders who reflect the communities they serve and the value of listening to the concerns and experiences of marginalized communities. Commissioner Cox also talks about the role of body-worn cameras in promoting accountability and building trust between the police and the public. He highlights the importance of professionalism and the duty to render aid in law enforcement. Finally, he shares his hopes for the future of policing and the legacy he wants to leave.

programme.title: Guest Chef Charlie Mitchell
programme.desc: Chef Charlie Mitchell was the first Black chef in New York City to earn a Michelin star. He got it for his acclaimed Brooklyn restaurant Clover Hill. Mitchell is a brilliant chef and this convo dives deep into the mind of a great chef.

programme.title: Highway to Health - Kevin Smith at Crossroads LA
programme.desc: Famed actor/director Kevin Smith reveals how he went vegan after almost dying of a heart attack.

programme.title: The Vegan Roadie - Mouthwatering Eats in Minneapolis
programme.desc: So many delicious foods from Minneapolis. Try the vegan meats that make Minneapolis a vegan hotspot!

programme.title: Vegan Travel with Eunice Reyes - Tour San Diego's Food Scene!
programme.desc: San Diego is one of the coolest cities in America, it's California's second biggest city, after LA.

programme.title: Veggie Coconut Curry!
programme.desc: One Great Vegan Gabrielle Reyes makes a coconut curry dish that's so delish, you'll want to sing!

programme.title: Romesh Ranganathan - Vegan Comedian/TV Star
programme.desc: Host of the British quiz show, The Weakest Link, Ranganathan is an English stand up comic & actor.

programme.title: Why He's So Famous in Finland
programme.desc: Meet Benjamin! He's famous in Finland! You won't believe what he does. It's why he's gone viral.

programme.title: Kale Krew - Tastes of Bri
programme.desc: Tastes of Bri, just outside of Chicago, offers plant-based dishes by a Le Cordon Bleu trained chef.

programme.title: Moving towards Humanity's Redemption!
programme.desc: Hundreds gathered as LA's infamous Farmer John pig slaughterhouse shut down for good.

programme.title: Farm Sanctuary - What It Takes to Care!
programme.desc: This video gives us an insight into the hard work it takes to care for the animals at Farm Sanctuary

programme.title: Milk Orphans
programme.desc: Brazilian animal activists race to rescue after hundreds of buffaloes are left to starve to death.

programme.title: Journey through India
programme.desc: Thomas follows Dr Sailesh Rao to India! Dr. Rao is a modern-day Gandhi, preaching as he goes!

programme.title: Countdown to Year Zero
programme.desc: Only a few years are left before the point of no return, so what can you do about it? Watch now!

programme.title: The Fear
programme.desc: The Bloody Hand tells the story of a student named Hien who studies in Little Saigon. Her peaceful life completely changes when the young girl rents a room that was once owned by Lien the daughter of the landlord, who was kidnapped, raped and killed by five criminals, who were never caught...

programme.title: The Devil's Fairground
programme.desc: Starring Justin Duncan, Gerald Crum, Mercedes Peterson and John Charles Dickson. The Stars of two competing and colliding paranormal television shows converge on an abandoned haunted amusement park which ends up being the epicenter to hell. They are now all trapped - in an all out war against pure evil...

programme.title: Whisper
programme.desc: A young Nurse is assigned to look after a patient in a remote location in the English countryside. As the night continues she finds herself terrorized by an unseen force that is connected with her patient...

programme.title: Isla Pitón
programme.desc: Un grupo de personas que buscan un árbol mágico en una selva misteriosa descubren que no están solos. Algo los observa, esperando el momento perfecto para atacar...

programme.title: Jack y Jill: Las Colinas del Infierno
programme.desc: Tras buscar a su hija desaparecida, una dama y su grupo de búsqueda descubren la leyenda que se esconde tras la pareja asesina de Jack y Jill...

programme.title: Ouija: Reunión Mortal
programme.desc: Sucesos extraños les ocurren a unos amigos antes de una fiesta de cumpleaños en un gran almacén. Dos de ellos encuentran un viejo tablero de espiritismo y deciden contactar con los antiguos inquilinos de la víctima fallecida...

programme.title: El Gavilán Justiciero
programme.desc: Historia llena de acción donde la codicia y la ambición desatan la más cruenta lucha, que trae como consecuencia el sufrimiento de una familia y la envidia de otra.

programme.title: Arareko Amor y Odio
programme.desc: Cuando fueron jóvenes no pudieron realizar su amor, ahora sus hijos vuelven a enamorarse. pero las envidias desatan el odio y la muerte en este bello pueblo llamado Estación Creel.

programme.title: El Mundo Es Tuyo
programme.desc: El cartel más poderoso ha puesto sus reglas y deben respetarse, la regla principal del patrón es prohibir los secuestros en la plaza. El comandante Ántrax es el encargado de hacer cumplir las órdenes del señor.

programme.title: Como El Gato y El Ratón
programme.desc: El barrio de La Estrella es uno de los más pobres de Bogotá. Allí habitan ciudadanos que han sido desplazados por la guerra y la violencia. Un día y tras años de espera, la luz eléctrica llega al barrio. La gente lo celebra y, pese a oponerse el edil, deciden usarla de manera ilegal. Todo se complicará cuando dos familias tengan un conflicto por unos cables cruzados.

programme.title: El Deseo de Domingo
programme.desc: Narra la historia de Domingo, un adulto mayor que sufre Alzheimer y pasa sus días en un geriátrico en la ciudad de Viedma, desde donde intenta, a toda costa, viajar a la Capital, a San Isidro, a ver el gran premio de turf Carlos Pellegrini. Pero claro, no se trata de cualquier premio, sino el del año 1952. Para eso necesitará de la ayuda de Marcelo, su nieto, quien se encuentra en el dilema de conformarse con su puesto en una dependencia pública o seguir luchando por triunfar con su banda de rock. …

programme.title: Call TV
programme.desc: Lucía, una actriz en decadencia, acepta presentar un programa nocturno de preguntas tontas. Sin darse cuenta de que se ha metido en un gran lío que le hará pasar la peor noche de su vida

programme.title: Inquebrantable
programme.desc: Lupita vive en Ciudad Juárez con su hija Margarita, el esposo de Margarita es un alcohólico, mujeriego, y golpeador, la hija de Lupita, Margarita va a la universidad pero desde niña tiene una enfermedad de un mal cardiaco causado por la violencia domestica que ha sufrido desde niña, el doctor Villa le comenta a Lupita que Margarita su hija va a morir si no tiene un donante de corazón, desesperada ella se pone a vender cualquier cosa de valor que tenga en su casa para comprar el corazón en el mercado negro.

programme.title: Vecinos del Terror
programme.desc: Por accidente se les dispara un arma con el impacto matan al cuñado quien después regresa de ultratumba a cobrar venganza y ni la policía se escapa de la venganza de ultratumba

programme.title: Los Siete Sellos de la Santa Muerte
programme.desc: Una serie de extraños asesinatos están ocurriendo en la ciudad. Una investigadora de lo paranormal y un detective privado se dedican a indagar en el caso y lo que encontraran será algo que nunca imaginaron.
